ygData.subject: Re: KS tricks + Grouping for XP
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Or do what I did, and just filter him to the trash barrel.  While we are on the subject of kill stealing.  If you are going to do it.  At least turn it
ygData.messageBody:
Phil Showalter wrote:

> From: "Phil Showalter" <phil@...>
>
> This guy's obviously just trying to start a flame war.... let him rant.
>

Or do what I did, and just filter him to the trash barrel. While we are on the
subject of kill stealing. If you are going to do it. At least turn it into a
positive. For instance, when you are around level 10ish, you can hang out at
the "plat" in Northern Ro. People will constantly be training /con yellow
mummies and madmen to there begging for your help. Not only will you get
descent experience and loot (As a wizard we always seem to get the kill ) ;)
You will be building a good reputation for yourself, and at the same time be
helping others out. Sometimes they are so greatful you may even get a 'tip'.
I've gotten everything from SoW to a couple of plat for doing this. And all
you did was let them tank while you nuke, nuke, nuke.
